channel.title: Html5 on Charvis Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on Charvis Yang

item.title: HTML 5
item.description: new elements &lt;figure&gt; and <figcaption&gt; &lt;figure id="fig1"&gt; &lt;figcaption&gt;Fig.1 Screen Reader Support for WAI-ARIA&lt;/figcaption&gt; &lt;img src="http://img2.cache.netease.com/cnews/2015/4/28/201504281107026599c.jpg" alt="JAWS: Landmarks 1/1, Forms 4/5 â€¦ "&gt; &lt;/figure&gt; &lt;mark&gt; This tag is very useful for the highlight of searching result. &lt;h1&gt;Yes, You Can Use &lt;mark&gt;HTML5&lt;/mark&gt; Today!&lt;/h1&gt; &lt;progress&gt; and <meter&gt; &lt;progress max="100" value="0"&gt; &lt;meter value="50" min="0" max="400" low="60" high="300" title="gigabytes"&gt; &lt;meter value="150" min="0" max="400" low="60" high="300" title="gigabytes"&gt; &lt;meter value="350" min="0" max="400" low="60" high="300" title="gigabytes"&gt; the low and high are the thresholds.
